description: The Department of Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada has a requirement for the supply, install and delivery of thirty-six (36) feed intake nodes fully compatible with Vytelle Sense 8000 Technology to Lethbridge, AB on or before March 31, 2023, and must provide warranty until June 30, 2025.

### Tender Details

This Advance Contract Award Notice is to inform the supplier community that the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) intends to award a contract to a pre-identified supplier to supply, install, and delivery thirty-six (36) feed intake nodes compatible with Vytelle Sense 8000 Technology.

Key documents can be found with the link:

http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14652802?extsite=MTQ2NTI4MDJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

A statement of capability must be received by December 1st, 2022 at 14:00 MST. The successful supplier will have a deadline to supply, install, and deliver the feed intake nodes on or before March 31, 2023, with warranty until June 30, 2025.

### Supervisor Information

*   Name: Lee, Victoria (SPAC/PSPC)
*   Email: <victoria.lee@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca>
*   Contact number: Not Available
